name: Yiki Action RPG
description:
Yiki Action RPG is a sandbox game with a kind of open world.
In this game you will manage a character of your choice with predetermined powers and abilities, which will allow you to pass the missions, defeat the enemies and ultimately complete and advance the game completing the missions assigned to you. Despite being a sandbox game clearly guided by the missions, the fact that it is a kind of open world allows you to go defeat enemies and explore the world on your own without taking into account the missions.
In addition, the game has several environments, which make it dynamic and entertaining, with different enemies in each environment.


Some features:

-The objective of the missions can vary from one to another, which adds dynamism (it is not always to defeat enemies)

-Inventory and equipment system

-Shops

-Tree of talents and abilities

-More than one character with different abilities.
